message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even above this price point, but I'm interested in a quick and easy sale. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This would be a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still constrained by my budget. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
